name: Plop It - Bop It for the Playdate
name_original: Plop It - Bop It for the Playdate
description:
A WIP "game" inspired by:

Simple high score feature and Marathon (endless) or Timer mode where you have 60 seconds to start, gain a second if you properly match the expected input, and lose a second if you don't.  Basically just learning some Playdate development and most of the work is done by NobleEngine.

Any and all feature ideas and feedback appreciated!  @iAmChrisTruman
